summary: **MythBusters** is a TV show where hosts Adam Savage and Jamie Hyneman used science to test if rumors, movie scenes, and news stories are true. It started in 2003 and ran for 14 seasons. They did experiments in San Francisco and around California. Sometimes, they had a second team to help. The show ended in 2016, but it was revived later with new hosts. There are also spin-offs, like **MythBusters Jr.** and **Motor Mythbusters**, where they test car-related myths.
title: MythBusters
